data.text: @ravikumaramal Hi Ravikumar, please note, children below the age of 12 years are exempted from carrying the negative report for RT-PCR on domestic flights (if not specified in the guidelines). You may refer to the statewise guidelines here: https://t.co/AiFTty8hjL for detailed information.
@N_v_n_R Please note, the booking was done via travel agency hence the amount has been processed towards the same source of booking.
@N_v_n_R Hi Naveen, as checked, full refund has been processed towards the travel agency ID dated 11th Sep'22. Kindly contact the source of booking for further refund claims.

@imsurjya Please note, if you are carrying it in your check-in luggage, then it should be properly packed. Further, a LRT (Limited Release Tag) for the fragile item (carton) will be signed at the time of check-in. Our airport staff shall assist you in this regard.

@imsurjya Please note that passengers carrying fragile articles in their check-in luggage needs to declare the same at the time of check-in so a fragile sticker for appropriate handling may be affixed. Further, our staff shall assist you.
